chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: During a drought, everything begs for even a mist for relief from the dryness.
humanum_full_description_en:
A shield with feathers (Guo Moruo, Li Xiaoding) on the upper part of the inscription " dry ". Because dry defensive weapon, it is " dry " there is defend the idea of Italy, is the " Han ", " defend ", " defend " the beginning of the text, Maogong Ding: "dry (defend) my (Royal) Wang body."

Oracle said to defend, "Compilation" 28059: "Gu Lingshu Qianwei". In addition to expressing defense and defense, the inscriptions are also used as the original meaning, expressing weapons, and expressing the meaning of "fighting", and also used as the name of the clan.

"Dialects": "Shield, from Guan and Dong, or Zhizhi, or Zhigan. Kansai is the shield." "Book. "Pastoral Oath": "Call Ergo, Birgan, and Lier Spear." Kong Anguo's "Biography": "Dried, Fuya."

"Shuowen": "Do it, do it. From the reverse, from the one. Everything that does it is done."

Scholars may think that the characters " gan " and " single " in the oracle bone inscriptions are different forms of the same character, like the hunting tool (Xu Zhongshu) with a cross on the upper part.
humanum_short_description_en: A shield with feathers on the upper part of the character " Qian " in the Jiajin inscription is a defensive weapon, so " Qian " means defending, and is the first article of " to defend ".
